spiritsExplanation:
The primary workout spirit for this video is "Structured & Disciplined," with a strong score of 0.8. This is based on the detailed focus on a "Strength Circuit Workout" as mentioned in the description, indicating a methodical approach to training. The systematic usage of tools like PowerBlock adjustable dumbbells and the structured programming common in strength training suggest a disciplined and precise workout style. The iterative mention of strength, circuit, and body focus in both the title and tags support this classification.

A secondary spirit is "High-Energy & Intense," with a moderate score of 0.6. While the primary emphasis is on structure, comments suggest an intense, full-body workout that "kept my heart rate up the whole time," implying a vigorous and energetic session. Although intensity appears secondary to structure, participant feedback on heart rate and the nature of circuit training suggests a notable high-energy component.

No distinct indicators were present for spirits like "Soothing & Restorative," "Flow & Rhythm," or "Outdoor & Adventure," as the focus is primarily on indoor, rigorous strength training with progressive disclosure of exercises.
